name: Telegram Radio Player V2
description: An Telegram Bot Maded By Safone to Play Nonstop Radio/Music in Telegram Voice Chats

API_ID.description: api_id part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: api_hash part of your Telegram API Key from my.telegram.org/apps

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token of Bot, get from @Botfather

SESSION_STRING.description: Session string, use @genStr_robot to generate pyrogram session string

CHAT.description: ID of Channel or Group where the Bot plays Radio/Music

LOG_GROUP.description: ID of the group to send playlist if CHAT is a Group, if channel then leave blank

ADMINS.description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands (for multiple users seperated by space)

STREAM_URL.description: URL of Radio station to stream when the bot starts
